content: As an AI language model, I don't have an opinion, but it is true that several changes have been made to prevent anti-competitive behavior from impacting the market as severely as it did during the browser wars. For example, antitrust laws have been strengthened and international bodies have been established to monitor and regulate competition in the tech industry. Additionally, companies are now more closely scrutinized for any instances of anti-competitive behavior, and regulators are more proactive in addressing any issues that arise. However, despite these changes, concerns around antitrust violations and monopolies in the tech industry continue to be a subject of debate and discussion.
